nodes.text: Nigel III was a planet in the Kira sector of the Expansion Region that had an Imperial presence in the form of a base. Officer Lynx Reglis was stationed there.
Nigel III was a planet in the Nigel system of the Kira sector, part of the Expansion Region. It had oceans and dry areas.

During the Imperial Period, the Galactic Empire maintained a military presence on Nigel III. The government of Nigel III monitored inbound and outbound starship traffic through its port authority, and the Bureau of Ships and Services had an office on the world. Imperial officer Lynx Reglis was stationed on the planet's Imperial base, where she in her spare time enjoyed several recreational activities, including ocean cruises and nature hikes. The pilot Duan Zorn found himself under arrest by Nigel III authorities after failing to pay port fees and stealing the Kazellis-class light freighter Longrunner.
Nigel III was introduced in Stock Ships, a 1997 supplement to the Star Wars Roleplaying Game published by West End Games.
